item.title: Canada Goes All In on AI: NVIDIA Joins Nations’ Technology Leaders in Montreal to Shape Sovereign AI Strategy
item.description: NVIDIA’s Kari Briski joins Canada’s AI Minister Evan Solomon and Cohere’s Aidan Gomez in a panel this week, as TELUS unveils Canada’s first fully sovereign AI factory in Rimouski and RBC Capital Markets creates AI agents for financial services.

item.title: NVIDIA, OpenAI Announce 'the Biggest AI Infrastructure Deployment in History'
item.description: OpenAI and NVIDIA announced a partnership that will scale OpenAI’s compute with at least 10 gigawatts of data centers powered by millions of GPUs.

item.title: The UK’s ‘Goldilocks Moment for AI’: NVIDIA, UK and US Leaders Highlight AI Infrastructure Investments
item.description: NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang discussed the UK’s plans to become an AI superpower with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, UK Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology Liz Kendall, UK Secretary of State for Business and Trade Peter Kyle, and US Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick.

item.title: Anthropic raises $13B Series F at $183B post-money valuation
item.description: Anthropic has completed a Series F fundraising of $13 billion led by ICONIQ. This financing values Anthropic at $183 billion post-money. Along with ICONIQ, the round was co-led by Fidelity Management & Research Company and Lightspeed Venture Partners. The investment reflects Anthropic’s continued momentum and reinforces our position as the leading intelligence platform for enterprises, developers, and power users.
